newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritius rupee strengthens marginally on dollar.
newsitem.headline: Mauritius rupee strengthens marginally on dollar.

text.p: The Mauritian rupee strengthened marginally against the dollar but weakened slightly against the pound on Tuesday, foreign exchange dealers said.
The rupee was fixed at a commercial bank mean rate of 19.916 to the dollar from 19.924 on Monday. Against the pound, the rupee was posted at a mean rate of 33.394 from 33.3145 on Monday.
"There is no big activity in the inter-bank forex market in this period of the year," said a dealer.
